name: Donuts On Donuts
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 47, where the theme was "stuck in a loop".

After seeing the theme, I'd decided to make a driving game, since it seemed like a good fit. When I was coding the basics, I was very hungry, and I started thinking about donuts, since you can do donuts with a car.

That lead me to thinking of doing donuts on a donuts.

And thus, this was born.

Dodge the randomly generated fruit to try and complete as many donuts as you can on top of the donut.
